charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED: CBOP: 19 years as to Counts 1 and 7 to be run concurrently with 2 years supervised release each as to Counts 1 and 7, to be run concurrently with special conditions; SPA: $200.00; RESTITUTION: $2500.00 to Navajo Nation, Court holds restitution open for 30 days for victim's non-medical expenses; deft held in custody
